Each Cabana is a private space where you can relax as you play the day away. With locations overlooking the Humunga River or Bombs Away Bay, a Cabana is your private oasis to Infinite Fun at Big Kahuna’s.
Includes All Day Rental of Cabana with seating for up to 10 guests, 4 Bottled Waters, & a Safe to secure your valuables.
Kowabunga Cabanas, Cove Cabanas, Croc Flats

Event Spaces
More Space to celebrate
with all your  friends
Outdoor
Catering
& Drinks
Invitations
& Signs
Our exclusive rental spaces cater to every group size, ensuring a perfect setting for your special day.
The Humunga River and Pleasure Island areas are for smaller gatherings of 20-25 guests.
The Cove area provides the ideal backdrop for medium-sized celebrations.
The Bombs Stage is a spacious venue perfect for school groups and large gatherings.
The Event Pavillion hosts special events and large groups of up to 250 guests.
Big Kahuna’s has the perfect space to transform your event into a tropical paradise of fun and festivities!
Book Now
Party Options
*Included items may vary by Party Package and in design. Cake and balloons are not provided but can be brought in;
no other outside food is permitted
.

About Us

We're All About Fun
At
Big
Kahuna’s
Water
and
Adventure
Park,
we
believe
every
day
is
a
good
day
to
make
a
splash!
Located
in
the
heart
of
Destin,
Florida—
just
minutes
from
the
famous
Emerald
Coast
beaches—
we’ve
been
creating
waves
of
fun
for
families,
thrill
seekers,
and
vacationers
for
decades.
From
soaring
down
our
towering
water
slides
to
taking
a
relaxing
ride
through
our
lazy
rivers
or
playing
a
round
of
tropical
mini
golf,
Big
Kahuna’s
is
where
unforgettable
memories
begin.
Our
mission
is
to
deliver
the
ultimate
family
experience
by
combining
excitement,
hospitality,
and
all
the
best
parts
of
a
beachside
getaway
in
one
vibrant
destination.
We
proudly
welcome
guests
of
all
ages
and
abilities
and
are
committed
to
creating
a
safe,
inclusive
environment
where
everyone
can
enjoy
the
ride.
Whether
you’re
visiting
for
a
day
of
water
park
thrills
or
celebrating
a
special
occasion,
Big
Kahuna’s
is
your
go-
to
destination
for
sun-
soaked
smiles
and
splash-
worthy
moments.
Our Mission
Our mission is to bring people together through spontaneous, unforgettable moments of fun.
Core Values
Our Core Values drive our culture. We work to create a culture of growth, continuous improvement, safety, learning, and fun!
Safety First
Family Fun
Splashtastic Service
Corporate Social Responsibility
Environmental | Social | Governance
We set goals and implement park improvements to demonstrate our commitment to environmental, social, and governance factors.
Big Kahunas Careers
The Team for People who love Fun
Big Kahuna’s and Boomers Parks are a favorite place to work! From food service to ticketers, office staff to ride operators, we’re always looking for talent to join our team. Come join our Team and work in a fun, exciting and energetic environment.
01.
find your spot
Ready to get started? Click the button below to explore where we’re hiring.
02.
apply online
Dust off your resume and submit your application – we make it all easy online.
03.
be prepared
If you like to smile and enjoy being around people, then this is a great job for you!
View Job Openings
Our Brands
We’re proud to offer a family of brands that strive for continual growth and improvement.
Boomers Parks is a privately held company with six family entertainment centers and two water parks located in California, Florida, and New Jersey. Boomers Parks provides best-in-class out-of-home entertainment, operated with a commitment of excellence to the communities they serve.

Don’t

Visit us in
Destin, FL
Embark on a sun-soaked adventure at Big Kahuna’s Water and Adventure Park in the breathtaking city of Destin, Florida! Nestled among the white, sandy beaches of the Florida Panhandle, our Destin location is your gateway to a world of aquatic excitement and family-friendly thrills.
Beyond the park, explore the charm of Destin – a city renowned for its Gulf of Mexico beaches, golf courses, and the iconic Destin Harbor Boardwalk. Nature trails in Henderson Beach State Park offer a tranquil escape, while the west welcomes you to the towering slides, waterfalls, and pools of Big Kahuna’s water park.
